chronologies.title: Mid-Level Developer at BMS
chronologies.description: I started a new job as a mid-level software developer, where the challenge is to create a project that facilitates companies that want to advertise their company on sites that are listed on exchanges (such as google). This project is very challenging because, in addition to being a multinational project, it must be very scalable in both the back-end and front-end.

chronologies.title: Automation for File Organization in Python
chronologies.description: In this project, I developed an automation tool aimed at streamlining the process of organizing files into folders. The program creates folders based on the file extension and moves the files to the appropriate folders. I worked with Python, OS, and more.

chronologies.title: Coupleflix Website
chronologies.description: The best website for couples seeking movie and series recommendations based on their preferences

chronologies.title: First Article Written on Medium
chronologies.description: I wrote a short article recounting my experience of how it was to create an extension for vscode.

chronologies.title: Project common--snippets
chronologies.description: In this project, I created a snippet and published it on VSCODE to facilitate the creation of React components or component testing. The idea is to expand it to include Node.js and other languages:

chronologies.title: Mid-Level Developer at OpenCircle
chronologies.description: I work as a mid-level developer at OpenCircle, primarily focusing on React, NodeJS (Nestjs), React-Native, micro-services, micro-front-ends with NX, and more

chronologies.title: Junior Developer at OpenCircle
chronologies.description: I worked as a junior developer at OpenCircle, mainly working with React, NodeJS, Express, React-Native, micro-services, micro-front-ends, and more

chronologies.description: I was promoted to Junior Programmer. I worked with PHP, PHP PHALCON, NodeJS, Express, React-Native and more.

chronologies.title: First job as software engineer intern
chronologies.description: I worked as a software engineer intern for a company called KFE SOFTWARE. I worked with PHP, PHP PHALCON, NodeJS, Express, React-Native and more.

chronologiesPT.title: Desenvolvedor de Software Pleno na BMS
chronologiesPT.description: Eu comecei em um novo emprego como desenvolvedor de software Pleno, onde o desafio é criar um projeto que facilita empresas que queiram anunciar sua empresa para sites que estão listada em exchanges(como google). Este projeto é bastante desafiador pois além de ser um projeto multinacional deve ser bastante escalável tanto no back-end e front-end.

chronologiesPT.title: Automação para organização de arquivos em python
chronologiesPT.description: Neste projeto criei uma automação onde visa facilitar a organização de arquivos em pastas, onde o programa cria pastas com base na extensão do arquivo e move para a pasta correta. Trabalhei com python, OS e mais.
